athuru waidya sewa eekabaddha peramune illim idiri sathi deka thuladi ki‡∑ärayathmaka kirimata saukhya amathyanshaye ekangathawa pala kara thibe.ee anuwa illim nawayak mulkara ganimin eeye (28 da) sidu kala wruththiya kriyamargaya ada (29 da) udasana 6ta awasan kirimata thama eekabaddha peramuna thiranaya kala bawa ehi kandawumkaru najith sumanasena mahatha prakasha kaleya.athuru waidya sewa wruththinta adala upadhi patamala kriyathmaka kirima, wishesha shreni thanathuru sandaha usas kirima kadinamin sidukirima ha warthamanayata galapena paridi nawa thanathuru sthapitha kirima, nirbadhaka usaswim kramawedaya kriyathmaka kirima, waidya ha heda sewawata danata kriyathmaka wana athuru waidya wruththinta balapana dimana wishamatha iwath kirima yanadi illim idiri sathi deka thuladi kriyathmaka kirimata saukhya amathyanshaye ekangathawa pala kara thibe.saukhya sewa adhyaksha janaralwaraya samanga me peramuna eeye (28) pawath wu sakachchawedi me thiranaya gena atha..

pasudina ohu awadiwa madasihiyenmen jalapaharata pana awida giyeya.tharamaka durak giyapasu ohu thama diyaniya dutuweya.kabarayan watawi ayage pranaya niruddha sirura kihipa polakin ada ada kanu penini.unmaththakayekuse edesata diwagiya ohu sathun palawa hara diyaniyage sirura osawagena diwagiye "ane mage duwa beraganna" lesa ka gasamini.paradige diwayana ohu alla mala sirura rohalen ragena giya athara priyankara manasika rohalakata yomukeruni.diyaniyage awasan katayuthu rohalen sidu keru athara ee sadaha sabhagi wimatath priyankarata awasthawak nolabini.age paliganima awasanwa athida, nathida kiwanohakiya.siyalla siduwi wasara kihipayak gathwelath priyankara thawamath jiwathun atharaya.namuth dinaka rohalen aa pasuwa ohuge iranama kese wisadewida?.
